Detailed Description

The Pulse Dial Interface.

Pulse Dial


Pulse Dial operation diagram


Within the US, EIA Standard RS-470 details the specifications for pulse dialing. In general, the pulse repetition rate must be between 8 and 11 pulses per second (PPS). The exact allowable range is dependent upon the type of capacitance used in the telephone's protective network. The Percent Break (the % of time that a Break state is maintained within a pulse) can be in the range of 58% to 64% (61% nominal), depending upon the type of Zener diode breakdown voltage used within the telephone's protective network. Assuming a PPS rate of 10, a the nominal length of the Break time will be 61 msec.
Note:
The "0" key will output 10 pulses, taking approximately 1 second to transmit (at 10 PPS).
The "5" key will take approximately 0.5 second (at 10 PPS).

Function Documentation

int rtk_SetDailMode ( uint32  chid,
uint32  mode 
)

Set FXO dial mode.

Parameters
chidThe FXO channel number.
modeSet mode to enable/disable Pulse Dial for FXO

Mode mode
Disable 0
Enable 1
Return values
0Success
Note
Virtual DAA not support
Examples:
pulse_dial.c.

Get FXO dial mode.

Parameters
chidThe FXO channel number.
Return values
0Pulse dial is disabled
1Pulse dial is enabled
Note
Virtual DAA not support

int rtk_PulseDialGenCfg ( char  pps,
short  make_duration,
short  interdigit_duration 
)

Pulse dial generation config for FXO.

Parameters
ppsThe pulse dial gen speed(Pulse per second).
make_durationMake duration of the pulse digit
Unit: 10 msec
interdigit_durationThe pause time between the pulse digit
Unit: 10 msec
Return values
0Success
Note
Virtual DAA not support
Examples:

int rtk_SetPulseDigitDet ( uint32  chid,
uint32  enable,
uint32  pause_time,
uint32  min_break_ths,
uint32  max_break_ths 
)

Set FXS pulse detection.

Parameters
chidThe FXS channel number.
enableEnable flag.
0: Disable Pulse detection for FXS
1: Enable Pulse detection for FXS
pause_timeThe threshold of the pause duration of the adjacent pulse digit.
Unit: msec
min_break_thsThe threshold of min break time.
Unit: msec
max_break_thsThe threshold of max break time.
Unit: msec
ex. If the pause duration of two pulse trains (digit 3 and digit 4) is smaller than PULSE_DIAL_PAUSE_TIME, then the detection result will be digit 7 (3+4).
Return values
0Success
